entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
